00002 !  ===============================================================
00003 !
00004 !                       DOUBLE_TARGET 
00005 !
00006 !   $Revision$
00007 !
00008 !   Add secondary target shifted by displacement vector displace(1:3) 
00009 !
00010 !  ===============================================================
00011 
00012 
00013 subroutine double_target
00014 
00015   use physvars
00016   use treevars
00017   use utils
00018 
00019   integer :: i,p, iseed1
00020   real :: xt, yt, zt
00021 
00022 
00023 
00024 ! Make copy of target displaced by vector displace(1:3)
00025 
00026   x(npp+1:2*npp) = x(1:npp) + displace(1)
00027   y(npp+1:2*npp) = y(1:npp) + displace(2)
00028   z(npp+1:2*npp) = z(1:npp) + displace(3)
00029 
00030   ux(npp+1:2*npp) = ux(1:npp) ! same velocities      
00031   uy(npp+1:2*npp) = uy(1:npp) ! 
00032   uz(npp+1:2*npp) = uz(1:npp) !
00033  
00034   q(npp+1:2*npp) = q(1:npp) ! same charge      
00035   m(npp+1:2*npp) = m(1:npp)  ! same mass
00036 
00037   pepid(npp+1:2*npp) = me                ! processor ID
00038 
00039 
00040   pelabel(npp+1:2*npp) =  pelabel(1:npp) + npart  ! labels: electrons_1, ions_1, electrons_2, ions_2 
00041 
00042   ! zero accelerations - should really compute these for electrons
00043   Ex(npp+1:2*npp) = 0.
00044   Ey(npp+1:2*npp) = 0.
00045   Ez(npp+1:2*npp) = 0.
00046   pot(npp+1:2*npp) = 0.
00047   Ax(1:2*npp)  = 0.
00048   Ay(1:2*npp)  = 0.
00049   Az(1:2*npp)  = 0.
00050 
00051   work(1:2*npp) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00052   iseed1 = -7901-me
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056   ! Double # particles/PE
00057   nip = 2*nip
00058   nep = 2*nep
00059   ni = 2*ni
00060   ne = 2*ne
00061   npart = ni+ne
00062   npp = 2*npp
00063 end subroutine double_target
